statements: UPDATE Agroforestry_Research_Data SET biodiversity_index = 4 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Agroforestry_Research_Data SET tree_height = 10.5, ecosystem_service = 'Pollination' WHERE species_name = 'Acacia';
UPDATE Agroforestry_Research_Data SET tree_height = 8.5, species_name = 'Maple', biodiversity_index = 3 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Agroforestry_Research_Data SET ecosystem_service = 'Pollination' WHERE species_name = 'Apple' AND biodiversity_index > 2;
UPDATE forests SET forest_name = 'Amazon Rainforest', location = 'South America' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE biodiversity SET biodiversity_index = 0.75, ecosystem_services = 'Carbon sequestration, water filtration' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE forests SET tree_species = 'Maple' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE biodiversity SET biodiversity_index = 0.75, ecosystem_services = 'Pollination, Air purification' WHERE forest_id = 2 AND date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE Biodiversity SET abundance = 100 WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE EcosystemServices SET service_description = 'Enhances soil fertility' WHERE service_id = 2;
UPDATE Biodiversity SET abundance = 100 WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE ResearchData SET research_description = 'New research findings' WHERE research_id = 5;
UPDATE biodata_research_study SET study_name = 'New Study Name' WHERE study_id = 1;
UPDATE biodiversity_data SET abundance = 50 WHERE species_name = 'Bird' AND study_id = 2;
UPDATE biodata_research_study SET study_name = 'Ecology Study', study_description = 'Research on ecosystem dynamics' WHERE study_id = 1;
UPDATE biodiversity_data SET abundance = 50, species_name = 'Flora' WHERE study_id = 1;
UPDATE biodiversity_research_data SET biodiversity_index = 8.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE research_sites SET land_use = 'Conservation Area', latitude = -34.0522, longitude = 118.2437 WHERE site_id = 2;
UPDATE biodiversity_research_data SET location='Amazon Rainforest', biodiversity_index=0.87 WHERE id=101;
UPDATE research_sites SET land_use='Conservation Area', latitude=-3.1234, longitude=-60.9876 WHERE site_id=301;
